channel.title: Quick start guides on ActiveState Platform Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Quick start guides on ActiveState Platform Documentation

item.title: ActiveState Platform
item.description: This quick start covers the first steps to take after you sign up for the ActiveState Platform.

item.title: ActiveState managed projects
item.description: Managed projects provide access to the ActiveState language distributions that are available to your organization.

item.title: Custom language runtimes
item.description: You can build a custom language runtime with the language, packages, and platforms you need.

item.title: State Tool CLI
item.description: This quick start is for intermediate or advanced developers who want to get up and running right away.
